sourcesContent:
• {{ faq.question }}
    {{ faq.answer }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-help-page', templateUrl: './help-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./help-page.component.css'], }) export class HelpPageComponent { //TODO export to interface faqs = [ { question: 'What is Angular?', answer: 'Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source web application framework developed by Google.', }, { question: 'What is TypeScript?', answer: 'TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds optional static typing and other features to the language.', }, { question: 'What is a component in Angular?', answer: 'A component is a building block of an Angular application that encapsulates the data, behavior, and template of a part of the UI.', }, ]; toggleAnswer(faq) { faq.isOpen = !faq.isOpen; } }
